Please please please i am begging you to send not only formula samples but a donation of formula from your company directly to the Maui Food bank for the people of Lahaina in Hawaii. The devastation of this wildfire disaster is horrific, hundreds were burned alive, and the people have no food or medicine and have said specifically they have no baby formula. Please please please help them, there is a lack of government assistance and insufficient practices from red cross and fema and they have lost everything. The Maui food bank address is 760 Kolu St, Wailuku, HI 96793. Please help as soon as possible.
